A powerful, keyboard-driven command bar for WordPress. Supercharge your WordPress workflow with quick commands and searches.

== Description ==

Lexia Command adds a powerful command bar to your WordPress site. Access everything in your WordPress site with just a few keystrokes.

= Key Features =

* Quick Command Bar: Launch with CMD+K (Mac) or CTRL+K (Windows/Linux)
* Universal Search: Find posts, pages, products, users, media, and more
* Fast Actions: Create, edit, or manage content directly from the command bar
* Modern UI: Clean, minimal interface inspired
* Keyboard-First: Designed for keyboard-driven workflows
* Extensible: Add custom commands via WordPress filters

= Use Cases =

* Quickly create new posts or pages
* Search and edit existing content
* Access media library
* Manage plugins and themes
* Navigate WordPress settings
* And much more!

= GitHub Repository =

For bug reports, feature requests, or to contribute, visit our [GitHub repository](https://github.com/stephen1204paul/lexia-command).

== Installation ==

1. Upload the plugin files to the `/wp-content/plugins/lexia-command` directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
2. Activate the plugin through the 'Plugins' screen in WordPress
3. Use the command bar by pressing CMD+K (Mac) or CTRL+K (Windows/Linux)

== Frequently Asked Questions ==

= How do I open the command bar? =

Press CMD+K on Mac or CTRL+K on Windows/Linux.

= Can I add my own commands? =

Yes! Lexia Command provides filters that allow developers to add custom commands. Documentation available in our GitHub repository.

= Does it work with custom post types? =

Yes, Lexia Command works with all registered post types in WordPress.

= Where can I report bugs or request features? =

Please visit our [GitHub repository](https://github.com/stephen1204paul/lexia-command/issues) to report issues or request features.
